function position_sub_index() {
    // item 79
    var i = sub_index_en.length;
    while (sub_index_en[--i] <
    elapse_from_start);

    subtitle_index=i;
    // item 81
    during_break=false
    during_playing=false
}

jQuery.fn.delay = function(time,func){
    this.each(function(){
    	setTimeout(func,time);
    });

    return this;
};
/*
 //@ sourceMappingURL=subtitle_player_js.map
 */
